text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The next day, T.M. Opera O called me<n>to "come witness the
most regal of<n>training regimens."

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I have no idea what kind of practice<n>she normally does... But
before I have<n>time to really think about it, I arrive at<n>my
destination.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Hehe, just in time. Let the training<n>now commence.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Why the surprise? I believe I said we<n>are to train. Where
else would one go?

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Now, stand back and behold.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: One, two, aaaand... THREE!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Ah! I dance as beautifully as a swan!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: At times elegant... At times dramatic!That's the cue for the thunder—baboom!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Opera O's performance continues as I<n>stand there
mystified...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: What does any of this have to do with<n>training?

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Heh... That should do it. Go<n>ahead—you may now give your
rave<n>review.
choice_data_list: Um, words are failing me at the moment...
Um, words are failing me at the moment...

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Wha... Were you even watching?!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Well, no need to fret. You<n>understandably need time to take
in<n>my artistic vision. Now, on to my next<n>training!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
The water is clear as a gleaming<n>diamond... It's as if my
coming has<n>been blessed.
choice_data_list: So what're we doing at the pool?
So what're we doing at the pool?

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Do you not see? I must strike the<n>perfect midair pose...
Await my glory!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
While her words are still unraveling in<n>my mind, Opera O
climbs the diving<n>board and leaps from the top!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Hark! What dances through the skies<n>with the grace of a
swallow? 'Tis I!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Splash!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Haaahaha! I hope my radiance didn't<n>blind you.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Pant... Pant... The final stop ontoday's training tour lies just atop thisstaircase!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: And we have arrived!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Obviously, we're making a visit to the<n>shrine.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Clink!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: May my beauty fill the whole world<n>with happiness...

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: May my beauty fill the whole world<n>with happiness!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: That is how we say our prayers at<n>the shrine.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Now, let's hurry back to school<n>before the heavens grow
wrathful in<n>their envy of me!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
With her unique style of preparation<n>completed, we've
returned to the<n>academy. Maybe now we can get to<n>some
actual work...

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Haha, what a worthwhile day of<n>training it's been.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
What say you? Having spent the day<n>together, have you
come to<n>comprehend my brilliance?
choice_data_list: You don't want to do any normal training?
You don't want to do any normal training?

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Normal training? My naive friend, thatwas my normal training.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
A cut above the rest, to be sure. For<n>that is what one must
shoulder as the<n>Centurial Overlord.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She seems to be completely serious,<n>but could that really be
how she wants<n>to train?

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
You appear to have something to say.<n>Go on, I shall grant
you the chance.
choice_data_list: Being the Overlord means having to win races.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Yes, that goes without saying.<n>Perhaps at this very moment,
you're<n>thinking...

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
"You won't win if you don't take<n>training seriously. You'll
never be<n>Overlord."

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Then let me tell you this, Trainer. I amalways serious.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: And this is the optimum training for a<n>ruler.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She's filled with such shameless<n>confidence that there's
nothing I can<n>say otherwise.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: You seem unconvinced...

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
A terrible shame—I'm afraid we'll<n>have to call off our
provisional<n>arrangement. I require a trainer willing<n>to follow
me to my dreams.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
I'm sorry for taking up your time.<n>May we meet again
someday.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Now, off to a fine rose bath to wash<n>away the fatigue of
hard work! Haaah<n>ha ha ha ha ha hah!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
T.M Opera O makes a grand<n>departure, but doesn't seem to
have<n>been offended.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
As I watch her go, a tinge of regret<n>comes over me. Maybe I
shouldn't<n>have spoken that way...
